<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Animal Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=2493) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your senses advance to match those of your animal aspect. You gain one of the following senses available to your inherent animal: echolocation (imprecise) 30 feet or [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 30 feet. If your inherent animal doesn't typically have a specific type of sense, you can't gain the sense with this feat.

**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, either choosing a different sense or improving an imprecise sense granted by this feat to a precise sense.
name: Greater Animal Senses
